headline: Tanium and ServiceNow Advance Autonomous IT Innovations to Strengthen Enterprise Infrastructure
summary: ORLANDO, Fla., November 18, 2025--Orlando World Center Marriott – Tanium, a leader in Autonomous IT, announced today at its 10th annual Converge conference that it is partnering with ServiceNow to deliver new innovations that advance Autonomous IT across enterprises. By integrating Tanium with the ServiceNow AI Platform, the combined capabilities drive greater efficiency, visibility and resilience across enterprise IT infrastructure. headline: Palo Alto Networks Announces New Prisma AIRS Integrations With Factory, Glean, IBM and ServiceNow to Secure the AI Agent Boom
summary: In today's enterprise, the adoption of AI agents is increasing dramatically, with production numbers projected to hit 1.3 billion by 2028. This rapid deployment introduces significant, yet often unseen, security risks. Today, Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ: PANW), the global cybersecurity leader, announced the next wave of secure AI innovation, unveiling new native integrations of Prisma® AIRS™ with industry-leading AI agent platforms from Factory, Glean, IBM and ServiceNow, to provide real-time, in

headline: Aria Systems Announces Expanded Partnership with ServiceNow
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, November 18, 2025--Aria Systems, the leader in AI-powered billing automation, today announces an expanded partnership with ServiceNow designed to simplify how enterprises adopt and implement modern, end-to-end order-to-cash solutions.

raw.headline: Aria Systems Announces Expanded Partnership with ServiceNow

headline: Microsoft unveils tool to help companies control, track AI agents
summary: Microsoft has helped companies build AI agents that can do specific kinds of work. Now it has a way to spot and stop risky agents.

raw.headline: Microsoft unveils tool to help companies control, track AI agents

headline: Examining ServiceNow’s Valuation After 20.7% Drop and Major Product Launches
summary: Curious if ServiceNow is a screaming buy or just riding the hype? If you want a clear take on whether its current price offers genuine value, you have come to the right place. The stock's recent moves have been choppy, with a 3.5% dip in the last week and a 7.5% drop over the past month. This adds to a decline of 20.7% year to date. However, its 3-year gain stands out at 115.8%. Behind these moves, ServiceNow made headlines with several new product rollouts and high-profile partnerships,...

headline: Q3 Earnings Highlights: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) Vs The Rest Of The Automation Software Stocks
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q3. Today, we are looking at automation software stocks, starting with ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW).
